page.title: 05CROSSCRAKE SCHOOL
page.content: The{first}school, mentioned by a{visitor of 1692,}was at{the church. The{school}moved to{its present site in the{1840's.}The{present}building, re-dedicated after remodelling in {1973,}has three classrooms, a library, a practical area with{pottery}and {cooking facilities}and a hall used for {P.E/Games}and Assemblies.{43 children} eat{school meals}cooked in the kitchen and{4}bring{sandwiches.}Outside there is a{playground}marked out for{netball and{skittleball}and a large{field with{football}and{rounders pitches as well as{large play equipment. The{staff}consists of{three {teachers, a caretaker,}who is retiring at the end of August, a{cook}and her {assistant}and a{school secretary. Mrs. {Knipe}teaches the Infants,{Mrs. {Harral}the Lower Juniors and{Mr. {Gaskins}the Upper Juniors.
